biotools.summary: The Gene Context Tool (GeConT) is a visualization tool for viewing the genomic context of a gene or group of genes, and their orthologous relationships, within any of the fully sequenced bacterial genomes. Sequence retrieval is also possible.

bioschemas.name: GeConT 2
